author: rfscholte
msg: Fix load of known null value

author: rhuijben
msg: Fix the merge test that I accidentally broke by reverting svn_wc_is_wc_root2
to its 1.7 behavior, by deprecating this function. The new function allows its
callers to determine the behavior they want by using extra output arguments.
(need_to_cache_iprops): Use svn_wc_check_root() to work properly on files
and just return TRUE for the repository root as fetching from the wc is
just as expensive as testing for the wcroot.
the older function that should return FALSE for files for legacy reasons.
